typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{indic_de,geo\time} as string,
		{2008} as float '##0.##',
		{2009} as float '##0.##',
		{2010} as float '##0.##',
		{2011} as float '##0.##',
		{2012} as float '##0.##',
		{2013} as float '##0.##',
		{2014} as float '##0.##',
		{2015} as float '##0.##',
		{2016} as float '##0.##',
		{2017} as float '##0.##',
		{2018} as float '##0.##',
		{2019} as float '##0.##'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({2008} = iifNull({2008}, 0),
		{2009} = iifNull({2009}, 0),
		{2010} = iifNull({2010}, 0),
		{2011} = iifNull({2011}, 0),
		{2012} = iifNull({2012}, 0),
		{2013} = iifNull({2013}, 0),
		{2014} = iifNull({2014}, 0),
		{2015} = iifNull({2015}, 0),
		{2016} = iifNull({2016}, 0),
		{2017} = iifNull({2017}, 0),
		{2018} = iifNull({2018}, 0),
		{2019} = iifNull({2019}, 0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		GEO_TIME as string,
		F2008 as double,
		F2009 as double,
		F2010 as double,
		F2011 as double,
		F2012 as double,
		F2013 as double,
		F2014 as double,
		F2015 as double,
		F2016 as double,
		F2017 as double,
		F2018 as double,
		F2019 as double,
		F2020 as double,
		F2021 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GEO_TIME = {indic_de,geo\time},
		F2008 = {2008},
		F2009 = {2009},
		F2010 = {2010},
		F2011 = {2011},
		F2012 = {2012},
		F2013 = {2013},
		F2014 = {2014},
		F2015 = {2015},
		F2016 = {2016},
		F2017 = {2017},
		F2018 = {2018}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
